title: kodalogic
description: Kodalogic revolutionizes analytics with stunning dashboards for Looker Studio and Google Analytics 4 (GA4). Its pre-designed templates are fast to set up, fully customizable, and packed with features like funnel charts, interactive filters, and KPIs for e-commerce, marketing, and sales. Built for speed and simplicity, Kodalogic empowers businesses to uncover actionable insights in seconds while prioritizing sustainability and data privacy. Transform your data into decisions with Kodalogic.
